recommendations.noTopics: No topics detected in the data. Run Phase 6 to identify topics before generating visualizations.
recommendations.completeDataset: Complete and robust dataset. All main visualizations were successfully generated.
recommendations.fewCategories: Few categories identified. This may limit the granularity of category analysis.
